reference.title: MME support for flexibility in configuring the S1AP cause codes (Feature f10902-02): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature offers the provisioning of S1AP cause codes case by case in the MME for the cause IE in UE Context Release Command and E-RAB Release Command messages. By default, the cause for each case is set to a value indicating the feature is disabled for this case, for example, the MME follows the previous implementation. The provisioned cause codes are provisioned in the new command s1apCauseCodeMappingProfile.

table.title: MME support for flexibility in configuring the S1AP cause codes: feature summary

p.ph: MME support for provisionable S1AP cause codes (Feature f10902-01)
MME provisioning for S1AP cause code to Normal release for double S1 and path switch (Feature f10907-01)
